item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, November 19, 2024 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Launch HN: Regatta Storage (YC F24) – Turn S3 into a local-like, POSIX cloud FS (468 points | 241 comments)
2. Rim/Blackberry tales – reply all (43 points | 15 comments)
3. Maslow 4: Large format CNC routing made accessible (156 points | 41 comments)
4. Show HN: FastGraphRAG – Better RAG using good old PageRank (348 points | 87 comments)
5. OpenStreetMap's New Vector Tiles (5 points | 1 comment)
6. 20 years of Google Scholar (324 points | 145 comments)
7. Expand.ai (YC S24) Is Hiring a Founding Engineer to Turn the Web into an API ( | hide)
8. Listen to what gets lost when an MP3 is made (2015) (86 points | 43 comments)
9. Scientific American's departing editor and the politicization of science (159 points | 180 comments)
10. Two undersea cables in Baltic Sea disrupted (343 points | 596 comments)
11. MailCatcher runs a super simple SMTP server (245 points | 74 comments)
12. DOJ will push Google to sell off Chrome (714 points | 836 comments)
13. Hyperfine: A command-line benchmarking tool (156 points | 27 comments)
14. Sequin: A powerful little tool for inspecting ANSI escape sequences (65 points | 23 comments)
15. It's hard to stop Math Acceleration once you start (77 points | 76 comments)
16. Batched reward model inference and Best-of-N sampling (18 points | discuss)
17. Online Age Verification as Trojan Horse for the Mass Rollout of Digital IDs? (3 points | discuss)
18. Museum of Bad Art (179 points | 128 comments)
19. A BBC navigation bar component broke depending on the external monitor (263 points | 110 comments)
20. Hong Kong Jails Benny Tai for 10 Years in Longest Security Law Sentence (52 points | 5 comments)
21. Magic Circle tries to track down first female member – who posed as a man (23 points | 26 comments)
22. Air traffic failure caused by two locations 3600nm apart sharing 3-letter code (231 points | 235 comments)
23. The tragedy of running an old Node project (130 points | 176 comments)
24. The Skyline algorithm for packing 2D rectangles (197 points | 46 comments)
25. Hyrumtoken: A Go package to encrypt pagination tokens (59 points | 39 comments)
26. Show HN: Dumbo – Hono inspired framework for PHP (57 points | 50 comments)
27. Paged Out #5 – hacker zine release [pdf] (10 points | 2 comments)
28. PyTorch 101: Understanding Graphs, Automatic Differentiation and Autograd (50 points | 2 comments)
29. Show HN: Tips.io – A Tailwind playground with AI, page management, and theming (247 points | 58 comments)
30. Iumenta: A generic framework for animal digital twins (16 points | 8 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, November 19, 2024 at 1:25 PM UTC
